p.s: Description of Blastopirellula marina comb. nov.

Basonym: Pirellula marina (Schlesner 1987) Schlesner and Hirsch 1987
The description is the same as that published for Pirellula marina (Schlesner, 1986), with the following additions.
The species is apparently strictly aerobic, as glucose is not metabolized anaerobically either by fermentation or with nitrate as the electron acceptor.
The chemical composition is identical to that in the genus description.
